resources.string:
(This message will only be displayed once)

We've modified the way you can interact with accounts:

When an account's 2FA code isn't visible, a click will show it, while a long click will take you to the account editing activity.

Conversely, when an account's 2FA code is visible, a click in the account area will hide it, while a long click will copy it to the clipboard and, depending on your settings, minimizes the app
Select the identity whose accounts you want to view

The identity will be deleted.

\This action has no effect on data stored on your server.

Are you sure you want to continue?

The identity and related accounts will be deleted.

This action has no effect on data stored on your server.

Are you sure you want to continue?

The identity and related accounts, including not synced accounts, will be deleted.

This action has no effect on data stored on your server.

Are you sure you want to continue?
Server identity data has been saved

The related accounts will be deleted.

This action has no effect on data stored on your server.

Are you sure you want to continue?

The related accounts, including not synced accounts, will be deleted.

This action has no effect on data stored on your server.

Are you sure you want to continue?
Server identity data has been changed.\n\nWhat do you want to do?
Enter a name for the server identity that will allow you to identify it in the list of identities (otherwise, the name set for the account on the server will be used, if available)
Please, enter the server location (including the http/https part and the port, in case this is not the standard).\n\nExample: https://demo.2fauth.app

The server location you specified is not secure.\n\nWe strongly recommend that you move it to a secure location (you may need to install traefik, nginx-proxy, or similar) except for testing purposes and if you are aware of the risks
Click to set a new token
Click to set the token value

Please, enter the token value.\n\nTo obtain a token go the server URL in a web browser, log in to your user account, navigate to "OAuth Settings" under "Settings" and finally click "generate a token" then copy the value and paste here
There was an error during synchronization process
Last synchronization was on %2$s but not completed due to the following error: %1$s

plurals.name: sync_details
plurals.item: Last sync was on %2$s and one accounts were loaded
Last sync was on %2$s and %1$d accounts were loaded
Last sync was on %2$s and %1$d accounts were loaded

resources.string: Attempts to sync server data every time the app starts
Attempt to immediately sync data to the server when it\'s added, updated, or deleted in the app.\n\nIn any case, not synced items are updated on global sync process
Error generating OTP code for counter #%1$d
Sort accounts by usage (list first the last accounts for which an OTP code has been displayed) instead of just sorting by service name
Removes last used data from accounts and sorting is reset
If you have added more than one identities, the label of the server identity to which the account belongs will be displayed
The name of the group to which the account belongs will be displayed, if applicable
Minimizes the app when an OTP code is copied to the Clipboard
Make your phone vibrate slightly in response to some actions, such as pressing a button, showing or hiding an OTP code, or copying it to the clipboard
Show animations for certain buttons, which adds a minimal delay to some actions in exchange for greater visual impact
Do not allow to take screenshots from the accounts list
The change will be applied the next time you start the app
Automatically hide the OTP code after a complete display cycle (you must press it again to display the next one)
For time-based codes (TOTP), displaying the code will also display the next one.\n\nPlease note that the \"copy to clipboard\" function will only work on the current code
Require a PIN code to access the app or perform some especially relevant actions

Please enter the PIN you will use to access the app.

PIN length will be from 4 to 8 digits.

You will not be able to access the app if you forget it
Please, enter new PIN again.\n\nRemember that you will not be able to access the app if you forget it
The PIN you\'ve entered isn\'t valid
The PIN and it\'s repeat do not match
Use the user\'s fingerprint instead of the PIN code
Fingerprint validation disabled due to biometric enrollment
An error occurred while accessing the KeyStore
Include a button in the identity data edition screen to copy the server access token to the clipboard (highly unrecommended if a secure access method is not activated)

We will attempt to download icons that was not found on your server, or was an incompatible format, from open source repositories using the service name, which may leak some private data, such as the 2FA services you use or your IP address
Click to view the Open Source License agreements of the external software libraries we use
Open the app\'s GitHub repository to get information about the latest releases, report bugs, or contribute to development
When you enter the app, it will connect to the repository to check for updates, downloading and installing them if necessary
You\'re using version %1$s of the app, but version %2$s has already been released. Would you like to update now?
Pre-releases includes new features, which may be unstable.\nPlease, do not forget to report any bugs you encounter
Only check for and download new versions of the app if there is an active WiFi connection
Enter a text to filter accounts…
How do you want to add account data?
You can select the QR code from the gallery or use the device camera, but in that case you will need to grant camera access permission if prompted

To protect your privacy, we will not use any external library to obtain the QR data but we will send it to your server for decoding, with the drawback that it will only be able to do so if you are connected to the server\'s network
When the QR code you select was decoded by your server, we will redirect you to the editing form to validate or edit the data
Select below the identity that will be used to decode the QR code:
Pending of deletion at server side
Icon loaded from your local storage
Account data has been changed.\n\nWhat do you want to do?

The identity associated with the account has changed, which will cause the account to be removed from the previous identity and added to the new one.

If synchronization cannot be completed immediately, an extra account (marked as removed) may temporarily appear in the accounts list.

Are you sure you want to continue?
This operation cannot be undone.\n\nAre you sure that you want to delete account data?

Account data will be restored to the state it was in when you deleted it.\n\nIf there was unsynced changes at the account data when you deleted it, these changes will be lost when data synced to the server
Error trying to load account data
Account data has been saved and synced
Account data has been saved but not synced
Error trying to save account data
Account data has been deleted locally and remotely
Account data has been deleted locally but not remotely
Error trying to delete account data
Error trying to undelete account data
QR codes are downloaded from the server \"on the fly\" using the data stored there, so we need to connect to download it.\n\nDo you want to download the QR code now?

QR codes are downloaded from the server "on the fly" using the data stored there, so we need to connect to download it.

Because you've updated some of the account details, the data included in the QR code might not be what you see on the screen.

What do you want to do?
Enter the name of the group
Cannot process request due to an internal error
